baseParameters.Query: SELECT Config_Value FROM Master_Config WHERE Config_Key ={} AND Config_IsActive = {}

baseParameters.query:
SELECT  
	CAST(ClaimMessage_Message_ID AS VARCHAR(255)) AS ClaimMessage_MessageID,
	ClaimMessage_MessageType,
	ClaimMessage_CCMVersion,
	ClaimMessage_CCMSchemaName,
	ClaimMessage_OriginatingSystemCode,
	Claim_ClaimFolderNumber,
	Claim_PolicyNumber,
	Claim_SecondaryClaimExaminerCode,
	CAST(DATE_FORMAT(Claim_AssignmentDate,'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss\'Z\'') AS VARCHAR(255)) AS Claim_AssignmentDate,
	Claim_ExaminerGroupCode,
	/* CAST(CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),RecCrtTs) AS VARCHAR(30)) AS RecordCreateTime */
	CAST(DATE_FORMAT(RecCrtTs, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') AS VARCHAR(30)) AS RecordCreateTime
FROM STG_EXT_SecondaryExaminer
WHERE 
Sent_To_CSV =0 and Is_current='Y'
